channel.title: [PI] How do i make npc's tele you?
channel.description: Like when you click them they tele you to a place?

item.title: [PI] How do i make npc's tele you?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“pk2play, post:3, topic:418695”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=521240.msg3787335#msg3787335 date=1318986984]
Go into NPC handler, and look for the number of the npc, for a man it would be

case 1:

Under that put,

c.getPA().spellTeleport(X,Y,H);
break;

and he will tele u if you did it right
[/quote]
No… In Actionhandler in firstclick assistant put:
case ID:
//TELE METHOD
break;[/quote]
:o my mistake… Forgot.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How do i make npc's tele you?

item.title: [PI] How do i make npc's tele you?
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Wow. You really are clueless.
under it, like
Case NPCID:
c.getPA()spellTelepoty(xxxx, yyyy, h);
break;
or something

//TELE METHOD
break;[/quote]

oh, thanks!
Can you gimme a snippet for it?
plllsssh?
<3
